mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zzupzzup.MEMBER(MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_ROLE, PASSWORD, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PHONE, LOGIN_TYPE, AGE_RANGE, GENDER, PROFILE_IMAGE, NICKNAME, STATUS_MESSAGE, REG_DATE) VALUES(#{memberId}, #{memberRole}, #{password}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{loginType}, #{ageRange}, #{gender}, #{profileImage}, #{nickname}, #{statusMessage}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ROLE, MEMBER_PHONE, AGE_RANGE, GENDER, PROFILE_IMAGE, NICKNAME, STATUS_MESSAGE, ACTIVITY_SCORE, MANNER_SCORE, REG_DATE, DELETE_DATE, DELETE_TYPE, BLACKLIST_REG_DATE FROM zzupzzup_test.MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId};

SELECT zzupzzup_test.RESTAURANT.MEMBER_ID, zzupzzup_test.RESTAURANT.RESTAURANT_NAME, zzupzzup_test.RESTAURANT.JUDGE_STATUS, zzupzzup_test.RESTAURANT.RESTAURANT_REG_DATE, zzupzzup_test.RESTAURANT.REQUEST_DATE, zzupzzup_test.RESTAURANT.JUDGE_DATE FROM zzupzzup_test.RESTAURANT LEFT JOIN zzupzzup_test.MEMBER ON zzupzzup_test.RESTAURANT.MEMBER_ID = zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.MEMBER_ID AND zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.MEMBER_ROLE = 'owner' AND zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS NO, MEMBER_LIST.* FROM ( SELECT MEMBER_ROLE, NICKNAME, COUNT_REP.*, REG_DATE, DELETE_DATE, BLACKLIST_REG_DATE FROM zzupzzup_test.REPORT, zzupzzup_test.MEMBER RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.MEMBER_ID, COUNT(CHAT_MEMBER_ID) AS COUNT_REPORT FROM zzupzzup_test.REPORT RIGHT JOIN zzupzzup_test.MEMBER ON zzupzzup_test.REPORT.CHAT_MEMBER_ID = zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.MEMBER_ID GROUP BY zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.MEMBER_ID ) COUNT_REP ON COUNT_REP.MEMBER_ID = zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.MEMBER_ID ) MEMBER_LIST WHERE (@ROWNUM:=0) = 0

SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS NO, MEMBER_LIST.* FROM ( SELECT MEMBER_ROLE, NICKNAME, COUNT_RES.*, REG_DATE, DELETE_DATE, BLACKLIST_REG_DATE FROM zzupzzup_test.MEMBER RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.MEMBER_ID, COUNT(RESTAURANT_NAME) AS COUNT_RESTAURANT FROM zzupzzup_test.RESTAURANT RIGHT JOIN zzupzzup_test.MEMBER ON zzupzzup_test.RESTAURANT.MEMBER_ID = zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.MEMBER_ID GROUP BY zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.MEMBER_ID ) COUNT_RES ON COUNT_RES.MEMBER_ID = zzupzzup_test.MEMBER.MEMBER_ID ) MEMBER_LIST WHERE (@ROWNUM:=0) = 0
